text: Matilde Ramos Lima (born 11 May 1999) is a Portuguese model and beauty pageant titleholder who was crowned Miss Universo Portugal 2017. She represented Portugal at the Miss Universe 2017 pageant in Las Vegas, Nevada, United States. == Personal life == Lima was born and raised in Setúbal. She studied to become a pianist in Academia de Música e Belas Artes Luisa Todi and in Conservatório Regional de Setúbal. This music lover also has an eye for fashion as it has been an interest of hers from an early age. == Pageantry == ===Miss Universo Portugal 2017=== Lima was crowned Miss Universe Portugal 2017 at the grand finale held on September 2, 2017 at Epic Sana Lisboa Hotel in Lisbon. She succeeds Flávia Joana Brito, the Miss Universe Portugal 2016. ===Miss Universe 2017=== Lima represented Portugal at the 66th edition of Miss Universe pageant in Las Vegas, Nevada but unplaced. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:People from Setúbal Category:Portuguese female models Category:Portuguese beauty pageant winners Category:Miss Universe 2017 contestants
title: Matilde Lima
